com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.binder.factory.HeaderCardBinder
public class HeaderCardBinder extends HeaderBinder
A HeaderBinder to bind the DynamicHeader inside a CardView that can be used with the DynamicBinderAdapter.
